name: Demand
description: A demand entity represents the public, not necessarily binding, not necessarily exclusive, announcement by an organization or person to seek a certain type of goods or services. For describing demand using this type, the very same properties used for Offer apply.
title: Demand

fields.name: sku
fields.title: sku
fields.description: The Stock Keeping Unit (SKU), i.e. a merchant-specific identifier for a product or service, or the product to which the offer refers.

fields.name: availabilityStarts
fields.title: availabilityStarts
fields.description: The beginning of the availability of the product or service included in the offer.

fields.name: availableDeliveryMethod
fields.title: availableDeliveryMethod
fields.description: The delivery method(s) available for this offer.

fields.name: areaServed
fields.title: areaServed
fields.description: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided.

fields.name: mpn
fields.title: mpn
fields.description: The Manufacturer Part Number (MPN) of the product, or the product to which the offer refers.

fields.name: serialNumber
fields.title: serialNumber
fields.description: The serial number or any alphanumeric identifier of a particular product. When attached to an offer, it is a shortcut for the serial number of the product included in the offer.

fields.name: ineligibleRegion
fields.title: ineligibleRegion
fields.description:
The ISO 3166-1 (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) or ISO 3166-2 code, the place, or the GeoShape for the geo-political region(s) for which the offer or delivery charge specification is not valid, e.g. a region where the transaction is not allowed.

See also eligibleRegion.

fields.name: gtin8
fields.title: gtin8
fields.description: The GTIN-8 code of the product, or the product to which the offer refers. This code is also known as EAN/UCC-8 or 8-digit EAN. See GS1 GTIN Summary for more details.

fields.name: availability
fields.title: availability
fields.description: The availability of this item—for example In stock, Out of stock, Pre-order, etc.

fields.name: priceSpecification
fields.title: priceSpecification
fields.description: One or more detailed price specifications, indicating the unit price and delivery or payment charges.

fields.name: inventoryLevel
fields.title: inventoryLevel
fields.description: The current approximate inventory level for the item or items.

fields.name: eligibleTransactionVolume
fields.title: eligibleTransactionVolume
fields.description: The transaction volume, in a monetary unit, for which the offer or price specification is valid, e.g. for indicating a minimal purchasing volume, to express free shipping above a certain order volume, or to limit the acceptance of credit cards to purchases to a certain minimal amount.

fields.name: availableAtOrFrom
fields.title: availableAtOrFrom
fields.description: The place(s) from which the offer can be obtained (e.g. store locations).

fields.name: warranty
fields.title: warranty
fields.description: The warranty promise(s) included in the offer.

fields.name: eligibleQuantity
fields.title: eligibleQuantity
fields.description: The interval and unit of measurement of ordering quantities for which the offer or price specification is valid. This allows e.g. specifying that a certain freight charge is valid only for a certain quantity.

fields.name: validFrom
fields.title: validFrom
fields.description: The date when the item becomes valid.

fields.name: advanceBookingRequirement
fields.title: advanceBookingRequirement
fields.description: The amount of time that is required between accepting the offer and the actual usage of the resource or service.

fields.name: validThrough
fields.title: validThrough
fields.description: The date after when the item is not valid. For example the end of an offer, salary period, or a period of opening hours.

fields.name: gtin14
fields.title: gtin14
fields.description: The GTIN-14 code of the product, or the product to which the offer refers. See GS1 GTIN Summary for more details.

fields.name: gtin13
fields.title: gtin13
fields.description: The GTIN-13 code of the product, or the product to which the offer refers. This is equivalent to 13-digit ISBN codes and EAN UCC-13. Former 12-digit UPC codes can be converted into a GTIN-13 code by simply adding a preceeding zero. See GS1 GTIN Summary for more details.

fields.name: gtin12
fields.title: gtin12
fields.description: The GTIN-12 code of the product, or the product to which the offer refers. The GTIN-12 is the 12-digit GS1 Identification Key composed of a U.P.C. Company Prefix, Item Reference, and Check Digit used to identify trade items. See GS1 GTIN Summary for more details.

fields.name: seller
fields.title: seller
fields.description: An entity which offers (sells / leases / lends / loans) the services / goods.  A seller may also be a provider.

fields.name: deliveryLeadTime
fields.title: deliveryLeadTime
fields.description: The typical delay between the receipt of the order and the goods either leaving the warehouse or being prepared for pickup, in case the delivery method is on site pickup.

fields.name: availabilityEnds
fields.title: availabilityEnds
fields.description: The end of the availability of the product or service included in the offer.

fields.name: businessFunction
fields.title: businessFunction
fields.description: The business function (e.g. sell, lease, repair, dispose) of the offer or component of a bundle. The default is http://purl.org/goodrelations/v1#Sell.

fields.name: eligibleCustomerType
fields.title: eligibleCustomerType
fields.description: The type(s) of customers for which the given offer is valid.

fields.name: itemCondition
fields.title: itemCondition
fields.description: A predefined value from OfferItemCondition or a textual description of the condition of the product or service, or the products or services included in the offer.

fields.name: itemOffered
fields.title: itemOffered
fields.description: The item being offered.

fields.name: eligibleDuration
fields.title: eligibleDuration
fields.description: The duration for which the given offer is valid.

fields.name: eligibleRegion
fields.title: eligibleRegion
fields.description:
The ISO 3166-1 (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) or ISO 3166-2 code, the place, or the GeoShape for the geo-political region(s) for which the offer or delivery charge specification is valid.

See also ineligibleRegion.
